page.title: 18Biography (1)
page.content: The{publican}: The day starts by getting up at{5.30 a.m.}He tidies the stocks and cleans the taps and pipes. Breakfast is usually at{8.00 a.m,}and then he is ready for food and drink deliveries. After this he starts to prepare the food for the lunch menu. He opens at{11.00 a.m}until{3.00 p.m. After this he has a nap and opens again at{6.00 p.m}and he has staff in to look after the bar. He closes at {11.00 p.m}but is usually tidying up until{12.00 p.m,}after which time he watches the news which he video recorded earlier in the evening. He gets to bed at{1.00 a.m.}The majority of visitors are local but he gets many outsiders in summer and over Christmas.
